name: We Got Compagnie!
storyline:
Make your own music as Violin Prodigy, Maestro, The Guide, performs a medley of duets against six consecutive monstrous vessels corrupted by Kappellmeister, a villain of a bygone era long before Soli Kingdom. Your attacks sync with each boss theme, and creates an experience of truly performing a duel-of-duets with each one of them. Go forth then, rosin your bow, and tune your violin, ‘cuz We Got Compagnie!

A Kingdom Of Corrupted Melody

From the dissonant Staccato Kingdom arose the Soli Kingdom like a symphony, after years of harmony thanks to the Prodigies appointed by the Conductor, she suddenly takes her leave confident in the leadership of this new Orchestral Family. However, a mysterious melody begins to corrupt the burrows and towns. Maestro the Violinist, a diplomat of the Orchestral Family returns to find the Kingdom corrupted. She now must face her friends, the corrupted Prodigies, and return Soli Kingdom to what it once was.
summary: Ready your bow, tune your magical violin, and liberate the musical prodigies mangled by a Corrupted Melody by playing your own melody. Prepare yourself, 'cause We Got Compagnie!
